text: Pokémon Sword and Shield are the first set of games in the eighth generation of the Pokémon series. They released on the Nintendo Switch on November 15, 2019. This is the first Pokémon game to have DLC, being The Isle Of Armor (released June 17, 2020) and The Crown Tundra (released October 22, 2020). == Gameplay == Main Article: Gameplay of Pokémon Gyms return from previous entries and the combat is the same with new Dynamaxing, which makes the Pokémon larger. == References == Category:2019 video games Category:Pokémon RPGs Category:Game Freak games Category:Nintendo Switch games Category:Nintendo Switch-only games Category:Video game sequels Category:Video games developed in Japan
title: Pokémon Sword and Shield
